name: Farm Chaos (McAgnus1337)
description:
Hello!

This is my very first "published" game, made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2. I dont have that much experience with game dev and pixel art! I really hope you have fun playing it! Looking forward to some feedback. I have not been that creative with the name of the game. If you have any suggestions, let me know!

Uploaded a zip if you want to download and/or have problems in browser.

Assets:

Art: Done by myself in Aseprite

Color Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/resurrect-64

Music & Sounds: Got ALL my sounds + soundtrack from https://www.zapsplat.com

Controls:

Arrow keys - Up, Down, Left, Right

"E" - interact with food boxes(cows), sunflowers, cats  and the chest

"P" - pause the game

Volume of music - top right side to change the volume
